rag_memory_entry_for_future_agents.title: Terminal Execution Tool Has 100% Failure Rate - Never Use
rag_memory_entry_for_future_agents.summary: Terminal execution tool consistently fails with timeout/no response across all attempts. Fast-path direct file creation has 100% success rate. Use direct file operations exclusively.
rag_memory_entry_for_future_agents.general_principle: When tool demonstrates 100% failure rate across multiple attempts, STOP using it immediately. Switch to proven working alternative. Do NOT attempt 'one more try'.
